subject: Biology
question_text: There are many different types of virus that can infect animal cells.
subtopic: Viruses, HIV, Immune System, Data Interpretation

difficulty.justification: Requires comparison of virus and cell structures, knowledge of HIV transmission, and interpretation of data from a table.

sub_questions.text: Compare the structure of a typical virus with a typical animal cell.

Human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) is one type of virus.
Describe how HIV is transmitted.
Use the information in the table to describe changes in the numbers of people infected and treated between the years 2000 and 2018.

tables.caption: Numbers of people infected with HIV globally and the numbers receiving treatment in different years.
